# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variables is the following:

* Short name: `cont_rel`
* Variable label: `Are any form of contact ( face-to-face/phone/mail/Internet communicators) with family members/relatives frequent (i.e. contact once a week or more often)?`
* Domain: `Social environment`
* Value type: `cathegorical`
* Categories:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | No
1        | Yes


* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

# Data process

## Finnish population

#### Study-specific variables

The study-specific variable elected to be harmonised is:

* Name: `q6211_spouse`
* Label: `Spouse face-to-face`
* Categories:

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any of q6211,..,q6215 in {3,4,5} then recode into 1`
* `if all of q6211,..,q6215 in {1,2} then recode into 0`

* `NA into 999`

 **R script:**

```{r harmo1 fin, echo=TRUE}
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$id)

COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6213_children <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6213_children), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other), "NA='-999'")

COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel)[1]){
  if( COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6213_children[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other[i] %in% c(3,4,5) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel[i] = 1 }
  else if(COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents[i] %in% c(9,-999) &
          COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6213_children[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch[i] %in% c(9,-999) & 
          COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other[i] %in% c(9,-999) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel[i] = 999 }
  else if( COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6213_children[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_fin_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel[i] = 0 }
}

COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel), "NA='999'")
COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1 fin}
vari <- COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3]) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
#Categorical_summary(var = COURAGE_ds_fin_w1$cont_rel, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_fin_w1, aes(x=factor(cont_rel))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Are any form of contact with family members/relatives frequent?") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any of q6211,..,q6215 in {3,4,5} then recode into 1`
* `if all of q6211,..,q6215 in {1,2} then recode into 0`
* `9 or NA's into 999`

 **R script:**

```{r harmo1 pol, echo=TRUE}
COURAGE_ds_pol_w1 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$id)

COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse), "NA='-999'")

COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6214_grandch), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6215_other), "NA='-999'")

COURAGE_ds_pol_w1$cont_rel <- c(NA)

  if( COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |

    else if(COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6211_spouse[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_pol_w1_cont_rel$q6212_parents[i] %in% c(9,-999) &
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any of q6211,..,q6215 in {3,4,5} then recode into 1`
* `if all of q6211,..,q6215 in {1,2} then recode into 0`
* `9 or NA's into 999`

 **R script:**

```{r harmo2 pol, echo=TRUE}
COURAGE_ds_pol_w2 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$id)

COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1), "NA='-999'")

COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel)[1]){
  if( COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel[i] = 1 }
  else if(COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) &
          COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & 
          COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel[i] = 999 }
  else if( COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_pol_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel[i] = 0 }
}

COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel), "NA='999'")
COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_pol_w2$cont_rel, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r descript2 pol}
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
```

```{r local2 spain}
#Categorical_summary(var = COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1, missing_values = NA)
ggplot(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel, aes(x=factor(q6215_other_s1))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Other relatives face-to-face") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `if any of q6211,..,q6215 in {3,4,5} then recode into 1`
* `if all of q6211,..,q6215 in {1,2} then recode into 0`
* `9 or NA's into 999`

 **R script:**

```{r harmo2 spain, echo=TRUE}
COURAGE_ds_spain_w2 <- tibble(id=COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$id)

COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1), "NA='-999'")
COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1 <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1), "NA='-999'")

COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel <- c(NA)  
for(i in 1:dim(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel)[1]){
  if( COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) | COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) |
      COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(3,4,5) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel[i] = 1 }
  else if(COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & 
          COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) & 
          COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(9,-999) ){ 
  COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel[i] = 999 }
  else if( COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6211_spouse_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6212_parents_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6213_children_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) | COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6214_grandch_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) |
      COURAGE_spain_w2_cont_rel$q6215_other_s1[i] %in% c(1,2) ) { 
  COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel[i] = 0 }
}

COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel <- car::recode(as.vector(COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel), "NA='999'")
COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel <- labelled(COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel, labels = c("No"=0, "Yes"=1, "Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Don't answer"=995,  "Not attempt/not done/not yet recorded"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI/interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript2 spain}
vari <- COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3]) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
#Categorical_summary(var = COURAGE_ds_spain_w2$cont_rel, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(COURAGE_ds_spain_w2, aes(x=factor(cont_rel))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Are any form of contact with family members/relatives frequent?") + ylab("Frequency")
```
